TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ClientRenderingException extends Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportViewerException

Docs.summary: Represents errors that occur when the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportViewer"> control is rendering a processed report from report page layout (RPL) format into HTML format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For errors that occur in local processing mode when processing a report or when rendering into RPL format, see <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.LocalProcessingException>. For errors that occur in remote processing mode when processing a report or when rendering into RPL format, see <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportServerException>.
